item.title: All Geometry Dash Codes (April 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Codes For Geometry Dash
  • All Active The Wraith Vault Codes
  • All Active Vault Codes
  • All Active Vault of Secrets Codes
  • All Active Chamber of Time Codes

Geometry Dash launched in August 2013 and quickly earned a cult following that appreciated the rhythm-based game. Jamming to the music of every level, players did their best to complete various Geometry Dash levels and earn diamonds and other prizes to unlock more in-game content, such as avatars and modes. Developed by RobTop Games, Geometry Dash rose quickly in its player base, and has remained prominent among indie gamers, thanks to its simple approach and rise in players across social media platforms. Players can also develop their own levels, challenging fellow Geometry Dash players around the world to take it on for bragging rights.

Updated April 13, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Geometry Dash occasionally offers codes that unlock rewards like icons, colors, and other customization options. These codes are typically released through special events or developer promotions. Be sure to check back later for any updates on available rewards.

All Codes For Geometry Dash

Geometry Dash players looking to add some extra icons and colors can gain access to a set of three vaults; The Vault, The Vault of Secrets, and The Chamber of Time, all of which come with their own series of codes and unlockables for this mobile game. Each vault requires certain criteria in order to be unlocked, and until then, players will not be able to access them or use any of the available codes.

These codes will also expire at random intervals, so redeeming them quickly is essential to ensuring access to the available icons and colors. Codes can only be redeemed once per account. Be sure to check back frequently, as codes can be released anytime during the month to introduce new stages, icons, and colors.

Codes Checked on April 12 , 2025.

All Active The Wraith Vault Codes

  • thickofit – 1 Mana Orb​ (NEW)
  • skibidi – 1 Mana Orb (NEW)
  • fireinthehole – 1 Fire Shard​ (NEW)
  • robtopisnice – 10 Mana Orbs​ (NEW)
  • bussin – 69 Mana Orbs​ (NEW)
  • wellmet – 5 Diamonds​ (NEW)
  • checksteam – 1 Demon Key​ (NEW)
  • touchgrass – 1 Earth Shard (NEW)
  • wateronthehill – 1 Ice Shard​ (NEW)
  • backondash – Cube 409​ (NEW)
  • key – 1 Demon Key​ (NEW)
  • geometry – Ball 90​ (NEW)
  • citadel – Cube 231​ (NEW)
  • retrospective – Ship 121​ (NEW)
  • iaminpain – 10 Diamonds, 100 Mana Orbs​ (NEW)
  • ruins – Ball 91​ (NEW)
  • spacegauntlet – 20 Diamonds, 1 Demon Key, 2 Metal Shards​ (NEW)
  • cheatcodes – UFO 138 (NEW)
  • backstreetboy – Robot 37​ (NEW)
  • noelelectra – Swing 17​ (NEW)
  • gd2025 – 1 Yellow Key, 25 Diamonds, 25 Mana Orbs​ (NEW)
  • duckstep – Ship 146​ (NEW)
  • skylinept2 – Cube 309​ (NEW)
  • boogie – Wave 92​ (NEW)
  • buttonmasher – UFO 63​ (NEW)
  • gdawards – Cube 485 (NEW)
  • ncsalbum – Jetpack 8​ (NEW)
  • gullible – 1 Mana Orb​ (NEW)
  • putyahandsup – UFO 71​ (NEW)

How to Redeem The Wraith Vault Codes in Geometry Dash

To redeem codes in The Wraith vault, you need to do the following:

  1. Open Geometry Dash and navigate to the main levels screen.​
  2. Scroll to find and select The Tower level.​
  3. Once inside The Tower, tap the icon resembling a face located in the bottom right corner to access The Wraith vault.​
  4. Enter each code into the text box one at a time.​
  5. If the code everything is okay, the corresponding reward will be granted.​

All Active Vault Codes

  • Lenny – Lenny icon
  • Blockbite – UFO
  • Spooky – Shy Guy Icon
  • Neverending – UFO
  • Mule – Ship
  • Ahead – Wave
  • Gandalfpotter – Trail
  • Sparky – Secret Coin
  • Robotop – Robot
  • (enter your in-game username) – Eye
  • 8-16-30-32-46-84 – Illuminati Wave

How to Redeem Vault Codes in Geometry Dash

Players can unlock The Vault in Geometry Dash by simply collecting 10 Silver User Coins . One method to get three Silver User Coins is to complete an Online Feature Level without dying. After unlocking the Vault in Geometry Dash , follow these easy steps to gain access to The Vault and use the aforementioned codes:

  1. Launch the game and open Settings by tapping on the icon at the bottom of the screen.
  2. An open lock icon will appear in the top right corner of the screen, which can be clicked to enter The Vault.
  3. In the box under the ‘ What are you poking around for?’ message, enter each available code, one at a time.
  4. If the code is correctly entered and is still valid, the reward will be distributed.

All Active Vault of Secrets Codes

  • Robotop – Robot
  • Octocube – the Octopus-Shaped Icon
  • Brain Power – the Brain-Shaped Icon
  • Seven – Finn (Adventure Time) Icon
  • thechickenisonfire – Swamp Green color
  • The Challenge – Vault Keepers level
  • Gimmiethecolor – Dark Red color
  • (Your number of stars*) – an Icon (players can find the number of stars on the game's main menu)
  • It’s a Puzzle – an Icon
  • Glubfub – a Secret Coin

How to Redeem Vault of Secrets Codes in Geometry Dash

In order to use the codes listed above, players will need to earn 50 Diamonds in Geometry Dash . This can be done by opening daily chests, completing daily quests, opening Treasure Room chests, opening a weekly Demon chest, and attempting Gauntlet levels. Once players have acquired the appropriate amount of gems, the following steps will need to be taken:

  1. Launch the game and click on the icon in the main menu.
  2. Click on the unlocked icon in the top right corner of the screen, this time choosing to enter The Vault of Secrets.
  3. Enter the desired code in the text box.
  4. If the code is correctly entered and is still valid, the reward will be distributed.

All Active Chamber of Time Codes

  • Volcano – Wave
  • River – Dark Green color
  • Silence – Second default Icon
  • Darkness – Face Icon
  • Hunger – Hungry Icon

How to Redeem Chamber of Time in Geometry Dash

To use the codes listed above, players will need to go to The Vault of Secrets, begin the secret challenge, and beat it to unlock The Chamber of Time in Geometry Dash . Players have to go through the following steps in order to gain access to the codes:

  1. Go to The Vault of Secrets and type " The Challenge" in the code redemption box, without quotations. This will begin a level that costs 200 Diamonds to enter.
  2. Complete the level and then tap on the door icon in the bottom right area of the screen .
  3. Go to the basement to find a locked demon who will ask you to unlock the door. Tap on all three keyholes to activate them.
  4. Go to the "Coming Soon!" section on the game's main selection page and click on the "i" icon to prompt a door and interact with the gatekeeper.
  5. Go back to The Vault of Secrets with 500 Diamonds in hand and press the button to enter an area with a green rope. Click it to open the secret shop and purchase the Master Emblem. Go back to the "Coming Soon!" section and open the door to enter the third chamber. Once inside, enter the code to redeem the prize.

Your comment has not been saved

Geometry Dash
5.5 /10
Released
August, 2013

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Jump and fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action platformer!

Prepare for a near impossible challenge in the world of Geometry Dash. Push your skills to the limit as you jump, fly and flip your way through dangerous passages and spiky obstacles.

Simple one touch game play with lots of levels that will keep you entertained for hours!

Rhythm-based Action Platforming! Lots of levels with unique soundtracks! Build and share your own levels using the level editor! Unlock new icons and colors to customize your character!

Fly rockets, flip gravity and much more! Use practice mode to sharpen your skills! Lots of achievements and rewards! Challenge yourself with the near impossible!

Developer(s)
Robert Topala
Platform(s)
Android, iOS, PC
Powered by

item.title: Roblox: Tower Defense Simulator Codes (April 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Tower Defense Simulator Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes In Tower Defense Simulator

There are many experiences in the tower defense genre, but Tower Defence Simulator stands out due to its atmosphere, well-designed maps, and interesting enemies. This article will be useful for Roblox players looking for freebies in this experience. Here they can find a complete list of Tower Defence Simulator codes and information about the rewards that they all offer.

Updated April 13, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Currently, there are no active codes available for Tower Defense Simulator . Previously, codes provided exclusive rewards as crates and skins, but these are no longer valid. Keep an eye out for future updates and new codes.

All Tower Defense Simulator Codes

Active Tower Defense Simulator Codes

  • No active codes.

How to Redeem Codes In Tower Defense Simulator

The process of redeeming codes in Tower Defence Simulator is quite similar to other Roblox games, so if players have previous experience, they shouldn't face any problems. For fans who are still confused about redeeming codes, there is a detailed guide below:

  • Launch Roblox: Tower Defence Simulator .
  • Press the button with the Twitter(X) icon located at the bottom of the screen.
  • Enter one of the above codes in the Enter Code Here field.
  • Click Redeem to receive the reward.

item.title: 6 Best Open-World Games Where NPCs Notice Your Achievements
item.description:
Summary

  • NPCs react differently to players based on their achievements & skill levels, offering praise or scorn.
  • Advancing in reputation in games like Cyberpunk 2077 or The Elder Scrolls 4 can affect outcomes.
  • Completing quests, fighting enemies, and improving reputation gradually influence how NPCs interact with players.

Given the mad, epic, and often nigh-impossible feats that most RPG protagonists are expected to pull off during their adventures, it is somewhat bewildering to find non-playable characters, who demonstrate realistic animations, dialogue, and behavior, utterly oblivious to the greatness of the hero (or antihero) standing before them.

It's nice to be appreciated, whether for saving the world or being the fasted gun-slash-spell-slash-bow slinger in the land. While they may stay quiet in the early stages of the player's zero-to-hero journey, NPCs in these games will eventually call out to players and call out their achievements, status, skills, or notoriety in interesting or amusing ways once they have attained them.

6 Cyberpunk 2077

Making A Name On The Street Is Everything

Your comment has not been saved

Cyberpunk 2077
6 /10
58
8.4 /10
Released
December 10, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

Powered by
  • Random NPCs will make comments if V has high enough Street Cred and certain missions will offer more options for V to take

Raising Street Cred in Cyberpunk 2077 doesn't just get a raised eyebrow or admiration from pedestrian NPCs. After grinding Street Cred to a high enough level, it can affect the outcomes of quests and even combat encounters. When people know that V is the real deal, they are more willing to put their trust in a mover and shaker with a good reputation and offer a leg up as a result.

Street Cred is improved by pulling off gigs, sick moves, and advancing through the story and Night City's high society. If V is famous enough, vendors will even offer discounts and access to their "back room stuff," or in other words, special gear.

5 Gothic

From The Worm To The Wyvrn Of The Colony

3 Images
3 Images

Your comment has not been saved

Gothic
10 /10
Released
November 23, 2001

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
t
Powered by
  • While hostile to start, NPCs progressively accept the player character as they advance through skill levels and the story

At the beginning of Gothic , the player is a lowly prisoner with no connections or renown. By the end of their adventure, they will have crossed just about every faction and defeated every enemy (not without great difficulty) and will have become a figure of legend in the prison. Hearing the player character being referred to as "brother" is a hard-won honor.

When the player is first locked up in prison, certain NPCs have no problem slapping the player character aside if they get in their way. By the end, they will think twice and certain NPCs will even run away when the player draws their weapon, knowing that they don't stand a chance.

4 The Witcher 3

From Reviled And Revered (And Occasionally Still Reviled)

Your comment has not been saved

Follow
Followed
The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
RPG
Action
Adventure
Systems
9 /10
43
9.3 /10
Released
May 19, 2015
ESRB
M for Mature: Use of Alcohol, Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content
Developer(s)
CD Projekt Red
Publisher(s)
CD Projekt Red

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

Powered by
  • Local NPCs will make harsh or kind comments depending on Geralt's actions, loyalties, and monster kills

By the time of The Witcher 3 , Geralt of Riveria has already become a figure of legend (despite the mistrust most folk might have for witchers), but that doesn't mean that peasants in the outskirts will necessarily show favor unless they directly benefit from his monster-slaying abilities.

As the player completes quests (with some of The Witcher 3 's quest choices being harder than others), they may notice villagers and city folk gossiping about his exploits. Of course, while Geralt can receive praise for his deeds, he can also receive scorn. If he goes against a faction, NPCs will remind him of it when he walks or rides by. If Geralt squeezes his clients for coins, they will remember his greed. If not, they will welcome their hero with open arms.

3 Fallout: New Vegas

The Courier That Changed The Fate Of Vegas

Your comment has not been saved

Fallout: New Vegas
8 /10
19
8.9 /10
Released
October 19, 2010

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Use of Drugs
Powered by
  • Both random NPCs and major NPCs will react differently depending on the build and story steps the player has made and completed for their courier

Fallout: New Vegas is famous for its branching storylines and reactivity. NPCs react to the player in several ways, from barks in the street commenting on how deep the player is in with a faction, random encounters with thugs who are trying to rob the wrong courier, and even story beats where a major NPC will directly recall all the achievements the player has made thus far.

Meetings with Mr House, Benny, or Caesar can go very differently depending on how much work the player's courier has put in depending on how many quests they have completed or how they completed them. Skipping steps can earn mockery, but even enemy NPCs will begrudgingly acknowledge the player's accolades if they have enough of them.

2 Kingdom Come: Deliverance

The Smallfolk Always Respect A Knight In Shining Armor

Your comment has not been saved

Kingdom Come: Deliverance
7.4 /10
Released
February 13, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Use of Alcohol
Powered by
  • Peasants and lords react differently toward those in different classes, and Henry's station is acknowledged both high and low

Kingdom Come: Deliverance is a game known for its striving for historical accuracy, but one bit of unrealism it indulges in is Henry's journey from lowly peasant to a knight of acclaim. As Henry moves through the ranks after performing exceptional deeds, he will begin to hear NPCs respond to him as "sir knight," especially after attaining the shiny sets of armor that make his station more obvious.

Unlike fantasy games, where ultra-expensive suits of armor were just lying around in chests, Henry has to actually earn them by currying favor with his betters. While less dramatic, doing favors for certain NPCs and factions will garner their affection for Henry, which will also spread to the wider community.

1 The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion

From Prison Escapee To A Much-Admired Citizen Of The Empire

Your comment has not been saved

The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion
19
9.5 /10
Released
March 20, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Language, Sexual Themes, Use of Alcohol, Violence
Powered by
  • NPCs will comment on the player's skills, attributes, and faction reputation, and after certain quest story steps

Starting out in Oblivion can be rough. The Hero of Kvatch starts out at the bottom, and with no prophecy written about them, must earn respect from people around them. This can be done by accruing skill levels, advancing through guilds, or saving Tamriel from otherworldly threats, all of which require tenacity and dedication.

For accomplishing any of these feats, NPCs will begin to pipe up as the player character passes them by in the street, admiring a strong shield arm, a prestigious member of the Mage's Guild, or thanking their savior for defending Cyrodiil against a Daedric prince. And who could forget everyone's favorite Elder Scrolls punching bag, the adoring fan, once the player becomes the Champion of the Arena?

item.title: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Reveal Easter Seven-Star Tera Raid
item.description:
Summary

  • Salamence is the next Seven-Star Tera Raid challenge in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet.
  • Salamence's Tera-type is Flying and is weak against Electric, Ice, and Rock-type attacks.
  • The event runs from April 17 to 20, with a second round from April 24 to 27.

On April 13, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet announced that a new Seven-Star Tera Raid challenge will start on Easter weekend, as trainers will face off against the draconic Salamence the Unrivaled. The Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Seven-Star Tera Raid challenge will have a second run on the last weekend of April for trainers who missed the first round.

Known as the Dragon Pokemon, Salamence first appeared in Pokemon Ruby and Sapphire . Salamence is a Dragon and Flying dual-type monster and is the fully-evolved form of Bagon and Shelgon. As one of two pseudo-legendary Pokemon from the Hoenn region alongside Metagross, Salamence is known for its fast and powerful onslaught of diverse attacks like Dual Wingbeat and Dragon Claw. In Pokemon Scarlet , Salamence received a version-exclusive, Past Paradox version of itself called Roaring Moon. By contrast, Salamence and its previous forms are more readily found in the wild areas of Pokemon Violet .

After a short break following the Tyranitar Seven-Star Tera Raid event, Pokemon trainers will soon have another dangerous foe to battle and capture. According to Serebii.net, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet will start the Salamence Seven-Star Tera Raid event on Easter weekend. The battles begin on Thursday, April 17, at 8:00 PM Eastern and end on Sunday, April 20, at 7:59 PM Eastern. A second round will run from April 24 to 27 at the same start and end times. Salamence the Unrivaled will have the Flying-type as its Tera-type and will grant the Mightiest Mark to trainers who defeat it. While previous Seven-Star Tera Raid bosses have exclusively carried a Hidden Ability, other Pokemon like Dondozo and Dragonite have used their standard Abilities instead. Ergo, Salamence has two abilities for Pokemon trainers to consider.

Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Salamence Seven-Star Tera Raid Details (Easter 2025)

  • Salamence the Unrivaled will be the next Seven-Star Tera Raid challenge in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet.
  • Salamence will have the Flying-type as its Tera-type.
  • The Seven-Star Tera Raid event runs from April 17 to 20, with a second run from April 24 to 27.
  • Electric, Ice, and Rock Pokemon attacks will be effective against Salamence.

Salamence's main Ability is Intimidate, which lowers the physical attack stat of opposing Pokemon by one stage, while its Hidden Ability, Moxie, raises Salamence's physical attack by a stage after defeating a foe. However, Salamence's Flying-Tera typing is not without its weaknesses. Given that Flying-type creatures take extra damage from Rock, Ice, and Electric attacks in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet , strong Electric Pokemon like Miraidon, Eelektross, and Zapdos could come in handy against Salamence the Unrivaled.

Between its abilities and moves like Dual Wingbeat, Earthquake, and Dragon Claw, Salamence's potential as a competitive Flying-type Pokemon will make it a tricky foe for Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players to overcome. It remains to be seen what strategies trainers will form to take down Salamence the Unrivaled.

item.title: 10 Space Games With The Best Stories, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • Space games let players establish massive intergalactic empires.
  • Space setting ideal for grand stories of adventure and existentialism.
  • Games like Halo, Prey, and Dead Space explore dark, compelling space narratives.

Outer space has played a key role in the imaginations of writers for almost as long as fiction has existed. The advent of story-based video games only encouraged this exploration of the final frontier. The endless void of space has proven the backdrop for some truly compelling experiences and adventures.

Space is an ideal setting for all kinds of stories, from grand adventure to crushing horror. The scale of the universe allows for themes of existentialism, while the potential existence of alien life gives writers and developers a chance to play on human fear of the unknown. The following games demonstrate why outer space has remained such an enduring setting for so long.

10 Halo 2

A Tale Of Two Soldiers

Your comment has not been saved

Halo 2
8.4 /10
Released
September 4, 2004

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Language, Violence
Powered by

The Halo franchise is one of the biggest names in science fiction video games, and its epic universe of grand war and conflict is still a fan favorite. While the first game's stirring tale of survival against a terrifying alien superweapon was memorable in its own right, the sequel expanded on the lore and the storylines of individual characters, making for a stronger narrative overall.

The most remarkable thing about Halo 2 's storyline was the addition of a new playable character, a Covenant warrior known as the Arbiter. This unlikely hero gave players a new perspective on the alien menace confronting Master Chief and the UNSC, and makes for some truly fascinating character dynamics when the two soldiers come face to face.

9 Tacoma

Missing Persons

Your comment has not been saved

Tacoma
6 /10
Released
August 2, 2017

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Sexual Themes, Strong Language
Powered by

Tacoma , a narrative adventure game from the makers of Gone Home , sets protagonist Amitjyoti Ferrier adrift on an abandoned space station. On her quest to recover the AI program running the facility, Amy learns what happened to the crew of the station through the use of an AR program that fills the rooms and halls of the station with holographic images of the crew, playing out recorded conversations and moments leading up to their enigmatic fate.

The narrative that unwinds through Tacoma 's digital ghosts is a stirring tale of perseverance and corporate corruption. The stress faced by the characters on the station as they face the emergency that will eventually leave the station derelict is deeply engaging, especially as the player begins to form emotional connections with these missing crewmembers.

8 Prey

Making Contact

Your comment has not been saved

Prey
9.3 /10
Released
May 5, 2017

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood, Language, Use of Alcohol, Violence
Powered by

Prey is a frightening immersive sim set on a spacebound research station overtaken by the monstrous alien Typhon. The protagonist, Morgan Yu, must find a way to prevent the alien menace from spreading to earth, either by destroying the entire station or by finding a way to neutralize the aliens safely.

Along the way, Morgan will learn more about the history of the space station and the dark truth of the Neuromod technology developed on board. Morgan's decisions during their adventure will have major ramifications, not only on who survives the alien attack, but on the future of the human race itself.

7 Dead Space 2

Surviving the Sprawl

Your comment has not been saved

Dead Space 2
8 /10
8.9 /10
Released
January 25, 2011

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language
Powered by

The first Dead Space game introduced fans to the horrifying Necromorphs and the hapless, traumatized engineer Isaac Clarke. Dead Space 2 expands on the fiction in a big way, shifting the action from the doomed ship Ishimura to the Sprawl, a massive moon-based space station overcome with horror due to the government's clandestine attempt to build a Marker in its depths.

In Dead Space 2 , players learn more about the horrific alien technology that creates the dreadful Necromorphs, as well as Isaac's role in this endless cycle of pain. The character's trauma is also explored in greater depth, and fans can get to know him much better, since this is the first game where he's fully voiced.

6 Returnal

It Never Ends

5 Images
5 Images

Your comment has not been saved

Returnal
10 /10
9 /10
Released
April 30, 2021

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T for Teen: Blood, Mild Language, Violence
Powered by

In Returnal , protagonist Selene is trapped in a vicious time loop, crash landing on a hostile alien planet every time she dies. As she explores this grim landscape, Selene will learn more about the circumstances of her awful curse, which is inextricably tied to her own tragic past.

Returnal 's bleak plotline plays out over countless loops. Players will have to master the gameplay and take down some truly punishing bosses if they want a chance at breaking the loop and getting Selene home.

5 The Outer Worlds

The Future For Sale

6 Images
6 Images

Your comment has not been saved

The Outer Worlds
9 /10
10
8.2 /10
Released
October 25, 2019

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language
Powered by

Obsidian's space RPG The Outer Worlds brings players to a solar system turned into a capitalist hellscape, where laborers are worked ceaselessly for the benefit of corporate overlords watching them from on high. The protagonist must rescue a shipful of frozen colonists who have been abandoned to endless suspended animation, while at the same time dismantling the corrupt system that has taken over the colony.

This bleak setting is made bearable through a cutting sense of humor and satire that carries players throughout the campaign. Players are also joined in their adventure by a crew of lovable misfits, each of whom has a different perspective on the corporate greed fueling this interstellar colonization.

4 Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic

A Galaxy Far, Far Away

Your comment has not been saved

Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
9.3 /10
Released
July 15, 2003

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T for Teen: Violence
Powered by

BioWare's classic Star Wars RPG set a standard that not many games in the iconic setting have been able to match. This immersive quest casts the player as a Jedi initiate, exploring the galaxy in a quest to claim the legendary Star Forge and protect the Republic from the Sith.

Like many other BioWare games, Knights of the Old Republic leans heavily on player choice. Fans can decide to fall to the Dark Side if they so choose. This plays well into the narrative when it is revealed that the player's custom character is, in fact, the legendary Darth Revan, wiped of their evil memories. The choices fans can make in Knights of the Old Republic have massive consequences for this legendary sci-fi setting.

3 Citizen Sleeper

Sleeper, Arise

Increasing corporate power is a persistent theme in speculative fiction, and Citizen Sleeper is no exception. The game stars a digitized human consciousness trying to escape the corporation that owns them. By utilizing dice rolls to navigate the space station they're trapped in and complete various tasks, the protagonist can navigate and survive a hostile corporate world, forming connections and learning more about this dystopian setting.

The narrative of Citizen Sleeper is heavily influenced by the choices players make throughout the campaign. There are multiple factions aboard the space station, each of which wants something different out of this corporate world. Players will have to think carefully about the decisions they make and be prepared to live with the consequences.

2 Outer Wilds

22 Minutes To Live

Powered by

This enthralling indie game sends the player deep into an alien solar system whose sun is about to explode. Across several 22-minute time loops, players must explore various alien ruins and learn why the solar system is doomed. Despite the tight timeframe of the game's primary loop, the solar system is packed with discoveries to make and characters to meet.

The history of the mysterious Nomai is central to the fate of this solar system, and indeed, the universe as a whole. The player's quest to break the loop will reveal a lot of truths about the nature of the universe and the player's own role in it.

1 Mass Effect: Legendary Edition

Saviors of the Milky Way

The Mass Effect trilogy is an iconic piece of science fiction and one of BioWare's most prominent IPs. This epic space opera casts players as Commander Shepard, a human war hero who must unite the disparate alien societies of the Milky Way in order to protect organic life from the sinister Reapers.

While the trilogy's ending did cause quite a bit of controversy, the overall story of the three games remains deeply impactful. The companions that join Shepard's quest over the course of the trilogy all have meaningful and engaging storylines, and the relationships that players can form with them are truly special.
